subject: Books on testing web applications that use JavaScript
msgSnippet: ... I m not aware of any books that discuss that specific topic, but I know that HtmlUnit and jWebUnit have varying degrees of JavaScript support. -- J. B.
messageBody:
Harbir Singh Hundal wrote:
> If You can let me know the name of the books for
> testing the webapplication developed in JavaScript, it
> will be great.

I'm not aware of any books that discuss that specific topic, but I know
that HtmlUnit and jWebUnit have varying degrees of JavaScript support.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
